Purpose:
Purpose
Determine that non-default width of Sidebar is retained after new window
  is opened or browser is restarted
Test steps:
Initial Conditions
None.

Steps/Description
Launch the browser Click with the mouse on the Sidebar grippy(mouse pressed) and expand
    the sidebar Make the width of the Sidebar to whatever you want (upto max
    allowed) Select File| New Navigator Window to open a new browser window Observe that the Sidebar width should be the same as in the earlier
    window and should not appear changed Also, after step3, select File|Quit to close the browser Restart the browser

Expected Results
After step 3 and step 6, sidebar non-default width should be the same as
  changed earlier
